title: In vitro
description: Schema for submitting an in vitro differentiated sample.

post_differentiation_time.title: Post-differentiation time
post_differentiation_time.description: The time that elapsed past the point when biosamples were differentiated.
post_differentiation_time.comment: Use in conjunction with post_differentiation_time_units to specify time elapsed post-differentiation. Use of this property requires post_differentiation_time_units specification.

post_differentiation_time_units.title: Post-differentiation time units
post_differentiation_time_units.description: The units of time that elapsed past the point when biosamples were differentiated.
post_differentiation_time_units.comment: Use in conjunction with post_differentiation_time to specify time elapsed post-differentiation. Use of this property requires post_differentiation_time specification.

treatments.title: Differentiation treatment
treatments.description: A list of treatments applied to the biosample.
treatments.comment: A list of treatments applied to the biosample.
